metadata.title: CVE-2021-30159 mediawiki: users can bypass intended restrictions on deleting pages in certain "fast double move" situations (moderate)
metadata.description:
DOCUMENTATION: In mediawiki package users can bypass intended restrictions on deleting pages in certain "fast double move" situations.
            STATEMENT: The mediawiki package was removed from OpenShift Container Platform (OCP) in version 4.3, therefore for OCP 4 has been marked as out of support scope.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
mediawiki is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
